ModuleTitle: Pathophysiology and Pharmacology for Nurses II
Department: Nursing/Alice Lee Ctr For Nursing Stud
ModuleDescription: This module will focus on developing knowledge in both pathophysiology and pharmacology relevant for nursing practice. Students will gain an understanding of the etiology, pathogenesis, clinical manifestations, diagnosis and management of some major disease states or ndisturbances in homeostasis. Students will gain a comprehensive understanding of drugs used to treat disorders addressed within this module.
Prerequisite: NUR1121 Pathophysiology and Pharmacology for Nurses 1 is now a pre-requisite.
